DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate corneal swelling , limbal redness , endothelial bleb response wear galyfilcon A lenses asian eye .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Daytime Corneal Swelling During Wear Galyfilcon A Lenses
DOC.criteria: Be legal age ( i.e . 18 year ) Be Asian descent ―Asian eye‖ identifying feature ( see Appendix A ) Be mentally competent , willing able sign write informed consent form . Have contact lens distance sphere requirement range 1.00D 6.00D . Have spectacle astigmatism < 1.25D eye Currently wear soft contact lens ( least 3 month prior trial ) without experience difficulty contact lens relate complication Have oculovisual examination within previous 12 month . Have normal eye evidence abnormality disease . For purpose study normal eye define one : No evidence lid abnormality infection No conjunctival abnormality infection No clinically significant slit lamp finding ( i.e . edema , stain , scar , vascularization , infiltrate abnormal opacity ) No active ocular disease Requires concurrent ocular medication . Clinically significant ( Grade 3 4 ) corneal stain ( FDA scale ) , corneal stromal haze , corneal vascularization , tarsal abnormality , bulbar hyperemia , limbal hyperemia , abnormality cornea would contraindicate contact lens wear . Has refractive surgery . Has anterior ocular surgery . Has ocular surgery injury within 8 week immediately prior enrolment study . History abnormal lachrymal secretion . Preexisting ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fit . Keratoconus corneal irregularity . Extended lens wear last 3 month . PMMA , hybrid RGP lens wear previous 8 week Any systemic illness would contraindicate lens wear medical treatment would affect vision successful lens wear . Has diabetes Known/reported infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV ) . History chronic eye disease ( e.g . glaucoma ARMD ) . Pregnancy , lactating , plan pregnancy time enrolment . Participation concurrent clinical trial last 30 day . Family member employee clinical site , investigator study staff . Currently wear habitual contact lenses EW basis .
